<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 15"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Songbird's Brush](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1760)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Kingmaker</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Good" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=83" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 84</row>

**Price** 6,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Glaive](/Weapons.aspx?ID=20)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The blade of this _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [holy](/Equipment.aspx?ID=299) [glaive](/Weapons.aspx?ID=20)_ shimmers with a prismatic sheen, as if faintly reflecting a rainbow. A _songbird's brush_ sheds [bright light](/Rules.aspx?ID=407) in a 20-foot radius (and [dim light](/Rules.aspx?ID=408) for the next 40 feet). When wielded in combat, the sound of the blade cutting through the air creates a soft, musical trill as if produced by a songbird. Sacred to the faithful of [Shelyn](/Deities.aspx?ID=17), a _songbird's brush_ is so named for the fighting style developed by worshippers of the Eternal Rose, which equates its sweeping swings to painting with a brush. A songbird's brush grants a +2 item bonus to [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) checks made to dance or sing as long as the glaive is held in two hands.

<document level="2" id="action-1367" />

**Craft Requirements** You are a worshipper of Shelyn.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Songbird's Brush
